pyntacle.misc.load_graph_utils module¶

filechecker(func)[source]¶

decorator to check the integrity of an input file :param func: function given in input :return: the same function with checked properties

graph_initializer(func)[source]¶

initialize the output graph for the Importer class (takes the return value of an Importer and works on it) :param func: one of the function for the Importer class :return: the graph object modifies

separator_sniffer(func)[source]¶

a function imported from graph_load.py that automatically detects the separator of the input file (if not provided) and replace the “sep” argument in the Importers function’s call :param func: :return:
